text: geudeul moduga mudeom-eulobuteo junim ap-eulo naomae yeon-yaghan jadeul i omanhan jadeul-ege malhagil sillo ulineun neohuileul chujonghaess-euni neohuineun-ulileul hananim-ui beollobuteo jogeum-ilado bohohal su issneunyago muddeola hananim-i ulileul indohaess-eossdeolamyeon ulido neohuileul indohaess-eulila ije-uliga noyeowohageona innaehanda hadeolado byeoldoliga eobs-euni uliegeneun pisincheoga eobsnolago hadeola
